appDescription.message: A browser translation plugin supporting multiple large language models (e.g., Gemini, Silicon Flow) with on-page and popup translation features.

textInputPlaceholder.description: Placeholder for the text input area in the popup.

settingsLink.description: Link text to the settings page.

geminiProvider.description: Label for the Gemini provider tab.

siliconflowProvider.description: Label for the Silicon Flow provider tab.

geminiApiKeyLabel.description: Label for the Gemini API key input.

siliconflowApiKeyLabel.description: Label for the Silicon Flow API key input.

getApiKeyLink.description: Link text to get an API key.

geminiApiPlaceholder.message: Enter your Google AI Studio API key
geminiApiPlaceholder.description: Placeholder for the Gemini API key input.

siliconflowApiPlaceholder.message: Enter your Silicon Flow API key
siliconflowApiPlaceholder.description: Placeholder for the Silicon Flow API key input.

fetchModelsButton.description: Label for the fetch models button.

modelSelectLabel.description: Label for the model selection dropdown.

geminiModelHint.message: Recommended to choose free models, e.g., gemma.
geminiModelHint.description: Hint for selecting a Gemini model.

siliconflowModelHint.message: Recommended to choose free models, e.g., qwen.
siliconflowModelHint.description: Hint for selecting a Silicon Flow model.

statusTranslating.description: Status message when translation is in progress.

statusError.description: Status message when an error occurs.

statusApiKeyNeeded.description: Status message asking the user to enter an API key.

statusModelsSuccess.message: Models fetched successfully! Please select a model.
statusModelsSuccess.description: Status message when models are fetched successfully.

statusModelsFailed.description: Status message when fetching models fails.

statusApiKeySaved.description: Status message when API key is saved.

statusModelSaved.description: Status message when a model is saved.
